roleset.name: to fix or enclose
roleset.note: EMBED-V NOTES: Frames file for 'embed' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from embed.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: Embedded [*-2] in the `` budget '' being concocted [*]by the House-Senate conference committee is [*T*-1] [something that [*T*-3] looks , smells and waddles like a duck]-2 .
example.arg: in the `` budget '' being concocted [*] by the House-Senate conference committee

example.name: with substrate
example.text: Embedded [*-2] in the `` budget '' being concocted [*]by the House-Senate conference committee is [*T*-1] [something that [*T*-3] looks , smells and waddles like a duck]-2 .
example.arg: in the `` budget '' being concocted [*] by the House-Senate conference committee
